page.title: 11Services (continued)
page.content: each community are the right mixture of shops for the average family.They provide perfect shops in the vicinity to the customer so it is a profitable business. There are many newsagents and confectioners in the area.Two to three to each shopping area. All of their papers come from Fleet Street in London.They have paper rounds for boys and girls over thirteen,providing jobs for teenagers and a paper delivery for the elderly and workers. There is a large assortment of other service shops in the area.There are D.I.Y.,Post Offices,Travel Agents and Estate Agents. There are many D.I.Y. shops, about one to each town.They provide an aspect of house improvement which is becoming popular.There are many services in the Woodham, Addlestone and Weybridge area.
